desc: STATSports is the worlds leading GPS player tracking company. We provide player analysis system for elite sports teams. Follow STATSports here for more updates daily. STATSports Viper, STATSports APEX. STATSports brand new Apex is the most advanced athlete performance-tracking device ever released.

layout.text: Perfect for before, during and after training, the discreet bonded pocket sits comfortably on the spine inside the garment. As worn by Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain.
